Title: Enacts the community solar opportunity and local approval reform (Community SOLAR) act
Summary: Enacts the "community solar opportunity and local approval reform (Community SOLAR) act"; authorizes municipalities to establish standards for distributed generation energy facilities.
LawCode: Add ยง79, Gen Muni L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to enacting the "community solar opportunity and local approval reform (Community SOLAR) act"
